index.pageDescription: Shard Bot is a Discord bot that allows you to manage your Discord server.

features.title: Shard offers you:
features.antinuke: Prevent the destruction of your server.
features.antiraid: Prevent raiders and malicious users from attacking your server.

showcase.automodDescription: Shard automatically moderates your server with efficiency.
showcase.moderationDescription: Shard haves a variety of moderation commands to help you moderate your server.
showcase.utilitiesDescription: And also a variety of utilities to help you manage your server.
showcase.loggingDescription: Be aware of what's happening on your server with Shard's logging system.

servers.pageDescription: Log in to access the dashboard.
servers.noServer: Don't see your server? & and log in again

index.pageDescription: Manage Shard Bot from this panel.
index.title: Dashboard

general.pageDescription: Manage Shard Bot from this panel.
general.title: General

antispam.pageDescription: Manage Shard Bot from this panel.
antispam.title: Anti-Spam
antispam.resetTimeoutDesc: How much time should pass before the trigger percentage is reset
antispam.percentageDesc: How much the percentage should increase (every time the action triggers) before punishing a user (When it reaches 100%, the user will be punished)
antispam.whitelistUsersDesc: Users that are exempt from the system
antispam.whitelistRolesDesc: Roles that are exempt from the system

antinuker.pageDescription: Manage Shard Bot from this panel.
antinuker.title: Anti-Nuker
